item.title: In-depth explanation of the distributed application efficiency improvement framework Apache EventMesh
item.description: Today we share Apache EventMesh event-driven distributed application runtime, which is a relatively new concept, and we hope we can bring some inspiration to you through this sharing. We all understand two concepts - message and event. Message refers to the update of a specific event, and this update is sent from one point to another after the message is deleted, and the message is a temporary state of existence; while event refers to what happens at a specific time, it is not bound to a specific recipient or client, and it is often can be replayed, backtracked and reworked.
